allArticles.title: AI IN SALES: GAME CHANGER
allArticles.excerpt: How machine learning is reshaping customer acquisition patterns and why traditional sales funnels are becoming obsolete. Deep dive into implementation strategies and real-world case studies.

allArticles.title: UI IN THE AGE OF AI
allArticles.excerpt: Are we considering how people interact with technology and ultimately AI in the fast evolving tech world? Exploring human-centered design principles for AI interfaces.

allArticles.title: THE FUTURE OF B2B SALES
allArticles.excerpt: Predictions on how AI assistants will transform enterprise sales processes over the next 24 months. What leaders need to prepare for now.

allArticles.title: BUILDING SUSTAINABLE STARTUPS
allArticles.excerpt: Lessons learned from co-founding three climate-tech companies: BENFET, Agora Climate, and Terra Zero. From renewable energy to carbon management.

allArticles.title: FROM ECONOMICS TO CLIMATE TECH
allArticles.excerpt: My journey from studying Economics at University of Warwick to co-founding multiple climate-tech ventures. The pivotal moments and decisions.

allArticles.title: MODULAR SOLUTIONS FOR COMPLEX PROBLEMS
allArticles.excerpt: How we designed BENFET's modular renewable energy systems. Product thinking applied to sustainable technology solutions.

allArticles.title: SELLING THE FUTURE: CLIMATE SOLUTIONS
allArticles.excerpt: Unique challenges and opportunities in selling climate-tech solutions. How to communicate complex environmental benefits to business decision makers.

allArticles.title: SCALING ACROSS LANGUAGES & CULTURES
allArticles.excerpt: Leveraging multilingual capabilities (Spanish, Catalan, English, Portuguese) to build international climate-tech businesses. Cultural insights for global expansion.
